website_summaries.verdict: If you've been to tanning salons in the past, you've probably come in contact with the Norvell brand before. A well-known, reliable brand that smells better than most of its competitors.
pros: We were impressed by how long the Norvell tan lasted —about 4 to 5 days before it started to fade
The mousse itself is quite dark, making it easy to see where you've applied it on your body
We find this extremely helpful for avoiding streaks and blotches
cons: Product has a wet, sticky feel that takes a while to dry

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite self- tanner. I used to work at a tanning salon and Norvell is my first choice. You can build this product to get desired color, but one coat is very natural looking. I never find this streaky but take extra time to rub it in. Best with circular motions and don't forget to thoroughly wash your hands! I prefer the mouse to the lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa B

customer_reviews.title: Painfully Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I thought norvell was the Cadillac of sunless tanners ? My cheap instant bronzer from sallies works a million times better than this . Beyond disappointed. Dries funky , smells funky , and guess what ?? Leaves that darn dreaded orangish dirty looking tinge on your skin as well
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Greisiger

customer_reviews.title: Light and non greasy
customer_reviews.text: The foam is light and easy to apply (I use disposable gloves). It doesn’t leave embarrassing streaks and has a pleasant light coconut smell. It is very natural looking (not orange!) The first day of use it is a very subtle looking tan, which can be built up by applying for several days. If I sweat the color has come off on clothes, but it is mild compared to other self tanners I have used.
customer_reviews.author: ShapeUp

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the scent of this. Smells almost like almonds - which is the color it leaves your skin! I have very dark brown hair and my skin color is more on the Irish side rather than my Armenian side, but this self tanner allows me to have the perfect color skin tint without being bronzed. It is very natural and I’m glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: LMc

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best self tanner I have EVER used. This is the same brand they use in my tanning salon when I go and get custom sprayed!! If you want something subtle with a healthy color, go for this one. Its like a fresh beginning of season tan. If you want something darker go with the Venetian color!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Best self tanner Iv'e used yet. I gives you a soft, very natural looking glow and is super easy to apply. I plan on using this product through the winter just to give me a little color. I have blond hair and blue eyes and have fair toned skin however, this color looks totally natural and just adds a bit of bronze. Super happy with the results!! An added bonus, it's not sticky when you apply it and it drying quickly and, it doesn't have that horrible self tanner smell.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Norvell
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this self tanner!! It gives the most amazing & believable bronzed glow!! No orange in this!! No awful smell either!! If you are tired of looking pasty this stuff is the answer!! 🤗💕
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the color of this tanner and the easy application/instant color of the foam. Would recommend using a tanner mitt to apply though! Makes for a smoother coverage and no mess on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: britt

customer_reviews.title: Great color. Good scent
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but the one I order came to me leaking in the package so I sent it back. I’m afraid to order online again
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: This product has a beautiful color. It is easy to apply and looks natural. It does have a slight odor after hours of wearing like most do but is not overly noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: mona

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Norvell spray tan products for years- it’s the solution used when I get them professionally done & as soon as I learned they had an at home line I was in! The best smell, the mousse blends so well and is so easy to use. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: rashelle

customer_reviews.title: this stuff is amazing. leaves you a beautiful color-- minus the funky ...
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is amazing. leaves you a beautiful color-- minus the funky smell. love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tee T.

customer_reviews.title: Saving My Skin
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sunless tanning! I had melanoma a few years ago and am always looking for a good product. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very Natural!!
customer_reviews.text: This has become my favorite sunless tanner. The foam allows you to see exactly where you have put it. I have gotten many compliments on my tan since I have been using this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Betsi Strain

customer_reviews.title: Workability
customer_reviews.text: It works very well and it’s not too dark st first so you can work up to the color you want
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Renaker-Jansen

customer_reviews.title: The best self-tanner I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: You will find that it is easier to apply with a mitt that covers your hand. Goes on smoothly and evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I have used it in the past and loved it. It goes on smooth and streak free. Also, it doesn't have that awful sunless tanner smell.
customer_reviews.author: susan hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Norvell is #1
customer_reviews.text: Great for discreet bronzing when spray tan not a. Option
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: if not my favorite, tanning/mouse lotion
customer_reviews.text: This is on the top, if not my favorite, tanning/mouse lotion. I am very pale and it works well with my skin tone. Super easy to apply and the color lasts a good 3-4 days before needing to re-apply.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Giovannini

customer_reviews.title: I liked it. It was a little runny to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it. It was a little runny to be a mousse.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia Howland

customer_reviews.title: Love the product check the exp date
customer_reviews.text: Great product but it expired October of 2016 Not very cool 👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Good for self tan.
customer_reviews.text: Good for a self tan! Definitely pair with a mitt as it doesn't streak. I would have to say I like Norvell Venetian Tan better as it gives a little darker tan.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Summer All Year Round
customer_reviews.text: Nothing gives me a fresh even tan like Norvell Self tanning mouse. Remember to wash hands after use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.Ballack

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!! Worst self tanner I have ever tried. It took well over an hour to dry all the way, sticky, and hard to blend. Very orange. Everytime I got in the shower after I put it on I felt like I was burning alive. After that, I looked like a scaley fish. Dried my skin out so bad. I put moisturizing lotion on every hour, and my skin was still so unhealthy and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great!!! I always purchase this and it works terrific!!! Thank you so much for your prompt shipment!!! Have a great day!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Miller

customer_reviews.title: best bronzer i've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Best Mousse bronzer on the market!!! You will not find a better bronzer (especially for the price!). My tan gets gradually darker over 24 hours with this mousse which looks amazing. This is my second bottle and I will forever be a Norvell user!
customer_reviews.author: EVF

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is one of the best sunless tanning items that I have ever used and I just started trying it out this year for the first time. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: great stuff
customer_reviews.text: great color. no smell. no skin irritation - which i often get from self tanners
customer_reviews.author: Jane Myrick

customer_reviews.title: Better than a tanning bed!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased so many sunless tanners... Norvell mouse is head and shoulders above any product I have used. I am 53 years old and have tried too many to count! It is a natural tan, easy to use , streak free, dries fast. I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: megan  b

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunless Tan Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to apply, very smooth. I apply with latex gloves. Even coverage, no odor. Drys in minutes and tan last longer than any other product I have ever used. I have been using this product for years... Liz
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Great tan, easy to apply good color, no orange, smells great
customer_reviews.author: Jack N

customer_reviews.title: Good self tanning mousse
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a nice even color to your skin. I'm fair completed and I looked like I had been out in sun for several days. The secret is to exfoliate before using. The color will last a lot longer if you do. Very pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: Nette

customer_reviews.title: Sent a expired product
customer_reviews.text: I was sent an expired bottle. It was expiration date was only a few months back so I decided to try it. And it did not work--gave me no color at all. It was easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene M. Roby

customer_reviews.title: Works great and smells good too!
customer_reviews.text: Best sunless tanner, natural looking results. This product smells great too, which is a blessing in a sunless tanner!
customer_reviews.author: C-Mama

customer_reviews.title: very easy to apply and has a nice color without a ...
customer_reviews.text: very easy to apply and has a nice color without a bad smell. Liked the Dancing with the Stars self tanner foam by Norvell and amazon no longer sells it so I decided to try this one and like it even better. The smell is better like a light powder scent
customer_reviews.author: Lynn F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I apply with a mitt and it works great! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: stower

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Much safer than using a tanning bed and cheaper than spray tans. I've been buying it for a couple years and will continue.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Great self tanner
customer_reviews.text: Love this, use it a few times a week on my face instead of foundstion, esp during the winter months! It's the best self tanner I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Dupe for high priced tanners
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great for the price. The color is good, not too orange. The smell is not bad compared to other tanners. However, the best thing about this is that when the tan starts to come off it doesn't get patchy,it just gradually fades away. You also get quite a bit of product. This is comparable to the more expensiv tanners for a fraction of the price. It is a little bit drying, but not enough for me to knock off a star.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product that looks natural on
customer_reviews.text: I have used just about every sunless tanner out there in all different price changes. This is a great product that looks natural on. It will stay for a few days after you apply as well. I got compliments on my tan and my moms friend asked for the name so she could buy it herself!
customer_reviews.author: Alana Mallon

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I've been using self tanners for a LONG time. I am always willing to give something new a try. What I like: Little smell Easy application Looks natural Price on Amazon What I don't like: Seems to take a while to dry
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. No streaking. Very easy to apply. Beautiful, natural color. I would highly recommend this product to any one who wants a great, easy tan.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Howard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product - I am fair-skinned and my legs NEVER ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product - I am fair-skinned and my legs NEVER tan. In the summer, I use sunless tanning products to give the effect of a tan on my otherwise blindingly white legs. Most sunless tanning agents turn my legs a shade of orange rather than tan and smell awful. This product does neither. The "tan" produced is a natural tan color and the smell is pleasant - not at all like other tanning products. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Coloradoreader

product_meta.title: Norvell Sunless Self Tanner Mousse with Bronzer - Instant Natural Looking Bronzing Glow, 8 fl.oz.
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL TANNING AT HOME: Norvell professional grade “bronzer in a bottle” brings you salon quality tan in the convenience of your home.

ZERO TO TANNED INSTANTLY: Lightweight, easy to blend and buildable tanning mousse delivers an instant, irresistible glow from head to toe, while premium-grade DHA levels develop, darken, and deepen over 24 hours.

EASY TO USE, PERFECT RESULTS: This simple to use self-tanning product delivers a streak-free, perfect tan in a velvety mousse. Advanced technology virtually eliminates that common, unpleasant sunless tanning odor.

MORE THAN JUST A TAN: Norvell’s proprietary formula is made using natural botanical extracts to deliver more than just exotic color. Anti-aging, soothing, hydrating and protective benefits of the formula help keep your skin in its best condition and allow your tan to look its best and last longer.

FOR BEST RESULTS: Apply product smoothly and quickly to freshly cleansed, lightly exfoliated skin. Ideal application is done with a Norvell Tanning Mitt or slightly damp sponge. After application, wait 8 hours before bathing, showering or swimming.
